## SDQ vs FTND

As a psychologist, comparing different questionnaires such as the Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire (SDQ) and the Fagerstrom Test for Nicotine Dependence (FTND) is an indispensable part of your work. Harmony, an insightful tool developed specifically for harmonisation tasks, can ease your work process by providing efficient and accurate matching for such questionnaire items. When considering SDQ vs FTND, Harmony's use of advanced natural language processing and AI can deliver valuable insights.

## Why Use Harmony for SDQ vs FTND?

With Harmony, you can intuitively compare the measurement instruments used in SDQ vs FTND. The software simplifies your task by providing a percentage match between each corresponding item in SDQ and FTND. With this, you can carry out comparative longitudinal studies across these different tools without the usual hassles of manual matching. Harmony not only compares these instruments but also allows you to use multiple languages, further broadening its utility.

## Making SDQ vs FTND More Accessible

Harmony is designed to make your work on SDQ vs FTND more efficient. On its easy-to-navigate web interface, you can either utilize pre-loaded instruments from its extensive database or upload your own questionnaires in PDF format. In essence, Harmony equips you with the technology to make an in-depth and accurate analysis of SDQ vs FTND, and many other questionnaire comparisons, faster and more effortlessly than ever before.

## Compare the items in SDQ and FTND

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#_" target="harmonyapp">Import just SDQ into Harmony</a> - compare SDQ with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#_" target="harmonyapp">Import just FTND into Harmony</a> - compare FTND with other instruments
